item.title: Review of Harvester
item.description: Drawbacks and Challenges> Drawbacks and Challenges # High Resource Requirements in Harvester> High Resource Requirements in Harvester # When initiating Harvester, the system immediately demands significant resources, utilizing at least 10GB of RAM and 4 CPUs.
